plot: Story of two young Mexicans, Rodrigo and Gabriela, decided to do what they loved the most and, against all odds, could make their wildest dreams come true.
title: For Those About to Rock: The Story of Rodrigo y Gabriela
plot_es: Story of two young Mexicans, Rodrigo and Gabriela, decided to do what they loved the most and, against all odds, could make their wildest dreams come true.
original_name: For Those About to Rock: The Story of Rodrigo y Gabriela
plot_en: Story of two young Mexicans, Rodrigo and Gabriela, decided to do what they loved the most and, against all odds, could make their wildest dreams come true.
